Package hrw.swenpr.bomberman.common.rfc

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bomb
    C <=> S Bomb is sent from the client to the server, when the user places a bomb.
    ErrorMessage
    C <= S ErrorMessage is sent from the server to one or more clients, when an error occurred.
    GameOver
    C <= S GameOver is sent from the server to all clients, when the complete game ends.
    GameStart
    C <= S GameStart is sent from the server to all clients, when every player send a UserReady message and the game is starting.
    Header
    Header for every data packet send over socket.
    Level
    Represents a level with its name and size, but no further information of the level.
    LevelAvailable
    C <= S LevelAvailable is sent from the server to all clients, when they are logged in (after LoginOk message).
    LevelFile
    C <= S LevelFile is sent from the server to the clients, when the game starts with GameStart message, so every client can display the level.
    LevelSelection
    C <=> S LevelSelection is sent from the client of the gamemaster to the server, when he selected a level.
    Login
    C => S Login is sent from a client to the server, when he tries to login.
    LoginOk
    C <= S LoginOk is sent from the server to a client, when the login was successful.
    RoundFinished
    C <= S RoundFinished is sent from the server to every client, when a round ended.
    RoundStart
    C <= S RoundStart is sent from the server to every client, when a new round starts and a new level can be selected by the gamemaster.
    TimeSelection
    C <=> S TimeSelection is sent from the client of the gamemaster to the server, when he selected the time (5, 10 or 15 minutes) for the game.
    User
    C <= S User is sent from the server to every client, when a new User is logged in or a round or game ended to update the score.
    UserDead
    C <= S UserDead is sent from the server to all clients, when one user dies from a bomb.
    UserPosition
    C <=> S UserPosition is sent from the client to the server, when a user moves his player.
    UserReady
    C => S UserReady is sent from the client to the server, when the player pressed the ready button.
    UserRemove
    C <=> S UserRemove is sent from a client to the server, when he leaves the game/closes the software.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Bomb.BombType
    Defines the bomb types.
    ErrorMessage.ErrorType  
    MessageType
    Defines all types of the RFC.
    User.UserColor
    Defines the colors of the users.
